ResponseRule.name: Dahl Introductory Taunt
ResponseRule.description: Dahl Calls Morgan--Mostly to distract and taunt him so some Operators can come kill him.

ResponseRule.name: Dahl Taunt: You're A Lab Rat
ResponseRule.description: Dahl Calls Morgan--Mostly to distract and taunt him so some Operators can come kill him.

ResponseRule.name: Dahl Taunt: You Wanted to Forget
ResponseRule.description: Dahl Calls Morgan--Mostly to distract and taunt him so some Operators can come kill him.

ResponseRule.name: Dahl Executes Alex
ResponseRule.description: Dahl Calls Morgan--Morgan is out of time. Dahl has found Alex and is going to execute him so that Morgan can hear.

ResponseRule.name: Dahl: Shuttle is ready to go
ResponseRule.description: Dahl Calls Morgan to tell him the shuttle is prepped to leave

ResponseRule.name: Dahl: Shuttle is about to leave
ResponseRule.description: Dahl Calls Morgan to tell him that time's almost up. Hurry up.

ResponseRule.name: Dahl: Shuttle is leaving
ResponseRule.description: Dahl Calls Morgan to tell him the shuttle is leaving. Time's up

ResponseRule.name: Morgan Escaped Trauma Ambush
ResponseRule.description: Dahl Calls Morgan after springing the Trauma Ambush.

ResponseRule.name: People In Life Support Have No Air.
ResponseRule.description: Dahl Calls Morgan--Dahl has turned off the air in Cargo Bay, dooming Sara and other survivors. Unless Morgan comes to life support and confronts Dahl.

ResponseRule.name: Dahl Reacts to Tracker Bracelet Removal
ResponseRule.description: Dahl Calls Morgan--Morgan is out of time. Dahl has found Alex and is going to execute him live.

ResponseRule.name: Psycho: Dahl Offers A Team Up
ResponseRule.description: Dahl Calls Morgan after realizing that Morgan has already murdered most of the survivors on the station and offers to team up.

ResponseRule.name: Psycho: Dahl Offers A Team Up. Fem Morgan
ResponseRule.description: Dahl Calls Morgan after realizing that Morgan has already murdered most of the survivors on the station and offers to team up.

ResponseRule.name: Psycho: Dahl Offers A Team Up--Follow Up
ResponseRule.description: Morgan is working for Dahl and has finished part of killing survivors.

ResponseRule.name: Psycho: Player Killed All Survivors
ResponseRule.description: Player finished Dahl's job. Dahl summons Morgan back to the Shuttle bay.

ResponseRule.name: Psycho: Player Took Down Kaspar
ResponseRule.description: Dahl offered Morgan a job, but Morgan instead ran into Kaspar somewhere and took him down.

ResponseRule.name: Psycho: Player Survived Ambush In Shuttle Bay
ResponseRule.description: Dahl tried to ambush and kill Morgan in the Shuttle Bay, but Morgan left without killing Dahl.

ResponseRule.name: Psycho: Player Went To Shuttle Bay Early
ResponseRule.description: This plays if Morgan and Dahl are a team, and Morgan goes to the shuttle bay. Should play if Morgan has a tracking bracelet or if not, when an Dahl Military operator spots him.

ResponseRule.name: Player Re-Activated Tracker Bracelet
ResponseRule.description: Player Re-activated his tracking bracelet.

ResponseRule.name: Player De-Activated Tracker Bracelet... Again.
ResponseRule.description: Player de-activated his tracking bracelet again

ResponseRule.name: Player De-Activated Tracker Bracelet... Again. Fem Morgan.
ResponseRule.description: Player de-activated his tracking bracelet again. Fem Morgan.

ResponseRule.name: Dahl: GUT no Gravity
ResponseRule.description: Dahl Calls Morgan as Morgan is traversing through the GUT. Taunts, then turns off Gravity.

ResponseRule.name: Ultimatum Failed. Male Morgan. January is Dead.
ResponseRule.description: Dahl calls morgan to let him know the survivors have all died.

ResponseRule.name: Ultimatum Failed. FemaleMale Morgan. January is Dead.
ResponseRule.description: Dahl calls morgan to let him know the survivors have all died.
